title: React Component with TypeScript
content: Create a functional React component that accepts props with TypeScript interfaces. Include proper error handling and accessibility features.

title: SQL Query Optimization
content: Optimize this SQL query for better performance by adding appropriate indexes and restructuring the WHERE clauses for a table with millions of records.

title: Python Data Processing
content: Write a Python function that processes a large CSV file in chunks, applies data transformations, and outputs clean data to a new file. Handle memory efficiently.
